CustomField.formula:
'Name:'+Name+BR()+ 'Father Name:'+Father_Name__c + BR()+ 'Roll Number:'+Text(RollNo__c)+BR()+ 'Email id:'+ Email_Id__c + BR()+ 'Batch:'+Batch__r.Name +BR()+ 'Course:'+ course__r.Name+BR()+ 'Owner Name:'+ course__r.Owner:User.FirstName + course__r.Owner:User.LastName+ BR()+
'Gender:'+Text( Gender__c )
CustomField.label: Student All Details
